reviews.review:
Best Half-Life 3 prequel 

Like if you still play this ancient game  in 2034
Um jogo incrivel, com uma gameplay de qualidade, e que apesar de ser um jogo antigo vale muito apena pegar ele na promoção.
oyun tam bir harika grafik oynanış hikaye öf diyorum oynamadıysanız hemen oynayın
Half Life 2 is a 2004 Game, it's old yes but it doesn't means they are outdated
This is the best game Valve ever released. Play it. You'll be ready when HL3 comes out.

弗里曼：为什么我的撬棍总是丢......
奈亚子：你猜

Still a good game

tss waiting for alyx
Immernoch einer der besten Story-Shooter welcher jemals veröffentlicht wurde. Eine Fesselnde Geschichte in unterschiedlichen Umgebungen sorgen für ein tolles Spielerlebnis !

If there was an option to smash the "recommend button" I would destroy it.
If anyone is looking for an awesome, imersive experience, then this is the perfect game for that.
Half-life has been so great and so far it didn't disappoint fans (let's not bring the number 3 here), it is well written and the general development of the game is amazing.
Buy it now. If your friend doesn't have HL2 THEN SPREAD THE WORD.

Это самая годная игра за всю история Half- lafe
Жду не дождусь  3 части
Oyunlar ile azıcık da olsa alakası olmuş olan herkesin mutlaka oynaması gerektiği 2004 yapımı Valve efsanesi. Gelmiş geçmiş en iyi FPS oyunu. Muhtemelen Half-Life 3 çıkana kadar da öyle kalacak.
Игра каторая не когда не устареет.
Just complete the first game and all sequels and you will understand why everyone needs Half-Life 3.
Considering that it's a game that came out in 2004, it has a fluid story and a gameplay that can still impress despite its antiquity, at least for me. Good job Valve.
Тот случай, когда в игру 2004 года играть интереснее, чем в большинство современных...
Still one of the best video games ever
Лучшая игра всех времён! Сколько раз не проходил, всегда поглощён ностальгией.
Даже в 2018 году эта игра актуальна.
雖然是款老遊戲 但遊戲性十足 劇情吸引人 唯一遺憾是無法看到結局...
밸브 컴플리트팩으로 싼값에 구매해서 저어어엉말 즐겁게 플레이 합니다
Вся ленейка жтой игры просто превосходна
Still one of the best games and communities!
我是2018年补票的半衰期。半衰期在今天看来已经过时了，无论是游戏性、剧情还是其他。当然我不应拿今天的标准苛责半衰期，但我觉得它的确让我失望了。
出色的剧情，舒适的手感，新式引擎带来的独特玩法，以及放到今天依然未过时的画质（看多了有几率晕3d）。让HF2这个04年的游戏放到8102年的今天依然被人们传为游戏史上的佳话，并在每一次打折活动中迸发着强大的生命力。
Это лучшая игра в мире, и я просто люблю её
just a good fucking game, just want a half life 3 them i can die in peace...
si Dieu achetait un jeu se serait celui-ci
Перепрошел осенью 2018, вполне реиграбельно) 10 хэдкрабов из 10
I always keep coming back to this game. It has hours of endless entertainment and I can never say no to speedrunning the coast levels.
Лучшая игра из какгда либо созданных 12/10
Fps alanında bir efsane olan oyun kendi zamanının en iyisi bütün zamanların en iyisi
Wish the third would come out but still a really fun game

Есть музыка современная, год пройдёт она устареет
Есть классика, она вечна

If Valve control the goverment 
World War 3 are not gonna happend

I haven't finished this game yet and I'm playing it waaay too late for its time but I can safely say that this game is surely revolutionary! The physics are incredibly good (I can not think of any other game with better physics than this "2004 video game") And they know how to use them well for puzzles and creative ways of destroying enemies. It almost feels like this is more of an "experiment" rather than a videogame (like the ones that the NASA or any other big research laboratories creates to see how far we are able to reach in the technology field). 
This title deserves the 10 out of 10 score by a long shot!

PD: Maybe since this game is just so perfect they are afraid to release a sequel... It may be impossible to top this "Mona Lisa" of gaming.

One of the best games I have ever played. Compeling story, outstanding enviroments. Truly a masterpeice. Before playing this game I had have heard many pleasant reviews from friends and youtubers, so when I bought the valve complete bundle, I got my hands on the whole series. I would say this game has aged very well. Although we may never get a third game, I'm happy to play this several times.

10/10
Would play again.
Великая, атмосферная и чудесная игра. Это уже легендарная игра, не смотря на возраст ее помнят и не забывают.

Uno de los mejores juegos de PC de todos los tiempos.

Si nunca lo has jugado, no puedes decir que te gusten los FPS.
Это, просто, ахуенно... Больше нечего сказать...
Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei. Mesmo meu computador na sendo um dos melhores, eu consigo jogar em 50 FPS.

Ancora oggi per molti versi uno dei migliori fps sul mercato
fisica eccezionale
trama coinvolgente
ambientazioni varie e divertenti

voto 9,5/10
Ahora entiendo a la gente que se terminó el juego.
Лучшая игра от Valve, и пожалуй, лучшая игра 2004 года...
Este juegazo tiene todo lo que quieras ya sea explosiones,zombies,armas,una alucinante historia y por ultimo y mas importante la crowbar de Gordon
Que decir de HL 2, un juego fundamental en cualquier biblioteca de steam.
